data.comment: The match has started at Gelredome.
The match has started at Gelredome.
Richard Martens awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Enschede is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Arnhem capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Riechedly Bazoer (Arnhem) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Arnhem.
In Arnhem Arnhem's Riechedly Bazoer is caught offside.
Arnhem awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Arnhem in the half of Enschede.
Throw-in for Enschede in their own half.
Can Enschede get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arnhem's half?
Enschede drive forward but Noa Lang is judged offside.
Richard Martens signals a free kick to Enschede.
At Gelredome, Sondre Tronstad has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Richard Martens awards Arnhem a goal kick.
Richard Martens signals a Arnhem throw-in in Enschede's half.
Arnhem drive into the zone and Nouha Dicko is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Arnhem.
Free kick for Enschede in the half of Arnhem.
Riechedly Bazoer (Arnhem) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Throw-in Arnhem.
Throw-in for Enschede at Gelredome.
Noa Lang (Enschede) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arnhem awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Enschede in their own half.
Can Arnhem capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Enschede's half?
Richard Martens blows against Arnhem's Nouha Dicko for offside.
Throw-in for Arnhem at Gelredome.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Arnhem to check on Riechedly Bazoer, who is grimacing with pain.
Riechedly Bazoer for Arnhem is back on the field again.
Throw-in Arnhem.
Arnhem are coming forward and Sondre Tronstad gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Enschede goal kick.
Enschede have a dangerous throw-in.
In Arnhem Enschede attack through Haris Vuckic. The finish is off target, however.
Arnhem have a goal kick.
Arnhem to take a throw-in in Enschede territory.
Richard Martens awards the away team a throw-in.
Enschede's Lindon Selahi has run offside.
Arnhem drives forward and Riechedly Bazoer gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Arnhem have been awarded a corner by Richard Martens.
Ball safe as Enschede is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bryan Linssen for Arnhem gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Enschede at Gelredome.
Corner awarded to Arnhem.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Arnhem’s Riechedly Bazoer and play has been suspended briefly.
Enschede needs to be cautious. Arnhem have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Enschede at Gelredome.
Jay-Roy Grot (Arnhem) has replaced the possibly injured Riechedly Bazoer.
Ball safe as Enschede is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Enschede in their own half.

The match at Gelredome has been interrupted briefly for a check on Giorgi Aburjania, who is down injured.
Enschede's Giorgi Aburjania is back in action after a slight knock.
Richard Martens waits before resuming play because Giovanni Troupee for Enschede is still down.
Patrick Vroegh is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Patrick Vroegh (Arnhem) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Yassin Oukili.
Enschede's Giovanni Troupee looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Richard Martens signals a Enschede throw-in in Arnhem's half.
Arnhem awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Arnhem to check on Jay-Roy Grot, who is grimacing with pain.

Jay-Roy Grot is back on his feet again.
Free kick Enschede.
Arnhem awarded a free kick in their own half.
Enschede's Oriol Busquets breaks free at Gelredome. But the strike goes wide of the post.

6 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Arnhem.
